text: Champagne can mean a number of things: *Champagne (wine), a sparkling wine *Champagne (wine region), the area where the wine is made *Champagne (province), a historical region in France, ruled in the past by the Counts of Champagne *Champagne-Ardenne, a modern administrative region of France *Champagne (movie), a 1928 movie by Alfred Hitchcock In Switzerland: * Champagne, Switzerland In the US: * Champaign, Illinois * Champaign County, Illinois
title: Champagne
